Error.Login failed: The username or password is incorrect!
Error.Registration failed: Could not create a new acoount for you! One or more fields contain erroneous data.
Error.Invalid username: The entered username is invalid or is already taken!
Error.Invalid password: The entered password does not match the requirements!
